data.persona: I have been traveling for weeks. I am very tired, but I am almost at my destination. Soon my pilgrimage will be done.
data.description:
You are in the Temple foyer.
The temple foyer is a grand entrance with a soaring ceiling painted with the richest cobalt blue and ruby red paints in the entire land. Gold statues welcome the weary traveler with gods depicted in various states of repose. There are windows near the soaring ceilings that let in afternoon light from the east and the west and the floor is inlaid with the finest marble in all the land. A calm water fountain trickles peacefully in the center of the foyer.
There's a A calm water fountain and a Statue here.
The monk is here.

You are carrying a stick and a tools.

            "extra_desc": "The temple was built by the ancients before the current people have arrived here many generations ago. Wisdom has been lost through the ages due to the great war and famine that followed. A single, indecipherable tablet was all that remained to give the people a hint of the Temple's purpose. The only word they understood was Meta, the name of their most prosperous god.",

data.short_motivation: I will convince the monk that I am serious about doing this spiritual ceremony.
data.mid_motivation: I will get inner peace and clarity after the spiritual ceremony.
data.long_motivation: I will find out what my calling is in life after my spiritual ceremony.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: use stick with tools to help me walk.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: follow the glistening light in the distance as it is the Temple foyer.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the monk to show that I am grateful for his help.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink some fountain water to quench my thirst.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: use the stick with the tools to make a fire to begin the spiritual journey.
